long_description: The REI Stratus Insulated Air Pad at 2.5 in. thick offers comfortable sleeping for backpackers and the long length weighs 25 ounces! Air tube construction is cushioned and insulated with high-performance, water-resistant PrimaLoft(R) synthetic microfiber to provide warmth, low weight and max compression. Larger tubes on the outside keep you from rolling off. Light weight materials and high efficiency insulated air system delivers a compact stowed pad for easy packing. Rugged Taslan(R) nylon diamond-ripstop top surface has a non-slip texture; 75-denier polyester bottom surface resists wear. Quick-closing, high-volume airflow valve allows the pad to inflate and deflate quickly. Fully welded construction is leak proof and extremely durable. Included stuff sack keeps the REI Stratus Insulated Air Pad protected when compactly stored.
short_description: The REI Stratus Insulated Air Pad at 2.5 in. thick offers comfortable sleeping for backpackers and the long length weighs 25 ounces!
